column1: Uchi////I'm not a big sushi eater
column2: but this place was pretty awesome. We went on a Wednesday night and the place was jam-packed!  We were disappointed to find that we couldn't get a table
column4: but we were pleasantly surprised to find that sitting at the bar was the Bombay! You get a personal chef when you sit at the bar
column5: he dropped us a plethora of samples throughout the night and we just delved into all of them.  Great food
column8: but overall this place made the whole night a memorable one. A+
